# Legnext AI - Midjourney API Integration Platform

> The #1 unofficial Midjourney API service for developers. Enterprise-grade REST API access to Midjourney's image and video generation without Discord or Midjourney account required.

## Platform Overview

Legnext AI provides production-ready, scalable Midjourney API integration for businesses and developers. Our platform eliminates the complexity of Discord automation by offering a simple REST API that brings Midjourney's powerful AI generation directly to your applications.

### Key Advantages

- **No Discord Automation**: Direct API access without complex Discord bot setup
- **Simple REST API**: Standard HTTP endpoints with comprehensive documentation
- **Production-Ready**: Enterprise-grade stability with 99.9% uptime
- **Scalable Architecture**: Built for bulk generation and high-volume workloads
- **Latest Models**: Support for Midjourney V6, V7, and Niji 6

## Product Features

### Bring Midjourney-Powered Generation to Any App

## What is Legnext Midjourney API?

Legnext provides enterprise-grade Midjourney API integration — the easiest way to add AI-powered image and video generation to your applications and grow your business.

### Complete Feature Set

**All Core Midjourney Features Available**
- Text-to-image generation with all Midjourney models
- Image editing (inpaint, outpaint, variations, upscale)
- HD quality output with professional-grade results
- AI video generation and enhancement
- All features accessible through one unified REST API

### Latest Model Support

**V7, V6, and Niji 6** - Support for all current Midjourney models:
- Midjourney V7: Latest flagship model with enhanced photorealism
- Midjourney V6: Proven quality for production workloads
- Niji 6: Specialized anime and illustration style model

### Enterprise-Grade Infrastructure

**99.9% Uptime Guarantee**
- Reliable performance for mission-critical applications
- Smooth operation under high-volume workloads
- Professional support and SLA commitments
- Redundant infrastructure for continuous availability

### Built for Scale

**Production-Ready for Business Needs**
- Batch generation for high-volume operations
- Fast iteration cycles for rapid development
- Concurrent request handling
- Efficient queue management for bulk tasks

### Flexible Speed Modes

**Optimize for Speed or Cost**
- **Fast Mode**: Standard production speed with consistent results
- **Turbo Mode**: 2x faster generation for time-sensitive projects
- Dynamic mode switching per request
- Cost-effective pricing across all modes

### Video Generation Capabilities

**Midjourney's Latest AI Video Model**
- Text-to-video generation
- Image-to-video animation
- Video upscaling and enhancement
- Professional motion graphics creation

[Get API Access Now](https://legnext.ai/dashboard)

## Image Generation Capabilities

### High-Quality AI Image Generation Powered by Midjourney

The most advanced AI image models available through a simple REST API. Legnext provides full access to Midjourney's features with enterprise-grade stability and comprehensive developer support.

**Key Image Generation Features:**
- Text-to-image generation with natural language prompts
- Advanced parameter support (aspect ratio, style references, character references)
- Multi-model support (V6, V7, Niji 6)
- Batch processing for high-volume needs
- Fast and Turbo speed modes

#### Customer Testimonial

**Ondrej B., CEO & Founder - Small Business**

> "Legnext's Midjourney API works flawlessly at scale. I've tested many providers, but this is by far the most reliable and stable solution."

**Get Started:** [Image Generation API Documentation](https://docs.legnext.ai/diffusion)

## Video Generation Capabilities

### Stunning AI Video Generation with Midjourney

Create professional-quality AI videos powered by Midjourney's latest video model. Generate motion graphics from text prompts or animate existing images — all through Legnext's production-ready API.

**Key Video Generation Features:**
- Text-to-video generation with natural language prompts
- Image-to-video animation (extend from first frame)
- Video upscaling and enhancement
- Customizable motion effects and camera movement
- Professional-grade output quality

#### Customer Testimonial

**Sarah Chen, Creative Director - Digital Agency**

> "Amazing video quality. What took days now takes minutes with Legnext's API."

**Get Started:** [Video Generation API Documentation](https://docs.legnext.ai/video-diffusion)

## API Feature Categories

### 1. Image Generation

**Familiar Midjourney Workflow via REST API**

Generate images using Midjourney's proven `/imagine` workflow, but through simple API calls. Support for prompts, reference images, and all Midjourney parameters.

**Available Endpoints:**
- `/imagine` - Text-to-image generation
- `/reroll` - Generate new variations of the same prompt
- `/blend` - Combine multiple images seamlessly
- `/pan` - Extend images in any direction

**Benefit:** Seamless Midjourney experience without Discord

### 2. Image Modification

**Enhance and Transform Generated Images**

Modify and enhance your generated images with powerful editing tools. Upscale resolution, create variations, or modify specific regions — all while preserving the original composition and artistic style.

**Available Endpoints:**
- `/upscale` - Increase image resolution with AI
- `/variations` - Create alternative versions with controlled changes
- `/inpaint` - Edit specific regions using mask-based selection
- `/outpaint` - Extend images beyond original boundaries

**Benefit:** Professional editing capabilities without complexity

### 3. Image Enhancement

**Professional-Grade Image Refinement**

Improve and optimize your images with AI-powered enhancement tools. Boost quality, adjust lighting, remove backgrounds, change textures, and transform images for any use case.

**Available Endpoints:**
- `/remove-background` - Automatic background removal with precision
- `/retexture` - AI-powered texture and material transformation
- `/enhance` - Overall quality improvement and refinement
- `/remix` - Transform images with new prompts while preserving structure

**Benefit:** Transform any image into professional quality

### 4. Video Generation

**Create Dynamic AI Videos**

Generate stunning AI videos from text prompts or static images. Create motion graphics, animations, and dynamic content using Midjourney's latest video generation models.

**Available Endpoints:**
- `/video-diffusion` - Text-to-video and image-to-video generation
- `/extend-video` - Extend video duration with AI-generated frames
- `/video-upscale` - Enhance video resolution and quality
- Model support: Midjourney Video Model V1

**Benefit:** Professional video creation in minutes, not hours

## Pricing Plans

Flexible pricing designed for developers and businesses of all sizes. Start free, scale as you grow.

### Free Tier (No Credit Card Required)

**Perfect for Testing and Development**

- **200 Free API Points** (one-time)
- Full image generation access
- Video generation support
- Moodboard feature included
- All Midjourney models (V6, V7, Niji 6)
- Fast & Turbo generation modes
- Community support via Telegram
- Rate-limited requests

[Try Free Now](https://legnext.ai/dashboard)

### Pro Plan - $30/month (Regular: $99)

**Best for Production Applications**

- **33,000 API Points Monthly** (approximately 11,000-33,000 generations depending on model and mode)
- All Free tier features included
- Top-up recharge support for additional credits
- Priority customer support
- Higher rate limits
- Commercial usage rights (per Midjourney's terms)
- Automatic monthly renewal

[Subscribe to Pro](https://legnext.ai/dashboard)

### Pricing Calculation

**API Point Costs by Model:**
- Midjourney V6 Fast: 1 point per generation
- Midjourney V7 Fast: 2 points per generation
- Midjourney Turbo: 3 points per generation
- Video generation: Varies by length and resolution

### Need Custom Solution?

Enterprise plans with custom credit limits, dedicated support, and SLA guarantees available.

[Contact Sales: support@legnext.ai](mailto:support@legnext.ai)

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is Legnext Midjourney API and how does it work?

Legnext provides a simple and stable API for Midjourney. You can generate images and videos using Midjourney's powerful AI directly through our API — no Discord accounts or manual setup required.

What Midjourney features are available through the API?

Our API includes all core Midjourney functions: text-to-image, upscale, variations, describe, blend, inpainting, zoom, and pan. We also support advanced parameters like --sref and --cref.

How can I use the different generation modes?

We support Fast Mode and Turbo Mode. You can select the mode in your API requests to balance speed, quality, and cost.

Is the content generated by Legnext API unique and original?

Yes. All content is generated by Midjourney's AI models and is unique to your prompts.

Can beginners use Legnext's Midjourney API?

Absolutely. Our API is beginner-friendly with clear docs, simple guides, and easy endpoints for developers at any level.

Can I use the content generated by Legnext API for commercial purposes?

Commercial use depends on Midjourney's terms of service and your subscription plan. Please check Midjourney's official terms for details on AI content usage rights.

Can I upload images or files to the API?

Yes. You can upload images for features like Describe, Blend, and reference-based generation

How do I get support if I encounter issues?

You can get help through our docs, Telegram community, and direct support email. Contact us at support@legnext.ai for immediate assistance with any issues.

## Be Part of Our Telegram Group!

Our last group reset, but we're rebuilding stronger. Come be part of it!
